display_name: Chronotype with missing data for individuals who use an alarm clock on weekends/freedays
description:
Item calculated based on combined review of Split week self-assessment of sleep survey (SASS-Y) and the Munich Chronotype Questionnaire (MCTQ).

[Search for all SASS-Y/MCTQ variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=sassy_mctq)
